item.title: Free Rondo Licence
item.description: Since Rondo won’t work on the latest MacOS ‘Catalina’ and I haven’t sold licenses for a number of years now, I have made a free license available to anybody who would like one.
item.dc:creator: Peter Zegelin

item.title: Rondo Discontinued
item.description: After a successful run of over 10 years, our MIDI playing app Rondo, has been discontinued. It still works on recent operating systems but is getting really long in the tooth and is proving impossible to update. There are vague plans for a rewrite but it could be a while. Many thanks to all the people that purchased Rondo over the years.
item.dc:creator: Peter Zegelin

item.title: New Update for MacSim
item.description: I am pleased to announce a new update to MacSim. It’s been a long time coming and it nearly didn’t happen, so I thought I’d explain what went wrong.
item.dc:creator: Peter Zegelin
